responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "A8D716D847C1203CFC424E8424AB47D8", "A coil projector, according to my findings, requires something called a \"mapping crystal.\" Apprently the deans at the of Carphin Academy used these crystals to create simulacrums of themselves by creating an imprint of their coils. In other words, they somehow copied their very essence into these crystals. I\'d check the places they lived first.")
name: MADD_0021_SergiasNote_19
